pr_title: fix: lookup for all available Executor services instead of only one

timeline.message: fix: lookup for all available Executor services instead of only one

timeline.bodyText: A "NullPointerException" could be thrown; "lookup" is nullable here.
timeline.author: vaadin-bot
mshabarov

replies.bodyText: Okay, as far as I understand the contract of Lookup is that lookup is supposed to return only one service impl. Thus, if we are expect there might be several executors here, then it makes sense.
replies.author: mshabarov

timeline.bodyText: Is that change for further features/bugfixes? Does it require to be covered by unit test, or it anyway will be covered in other PRs?
timeline.author: mshabarov

replies.bodyText:
Since there is no unit test for lookup.lookup  there is no "replacement" for it.
All DevModeHandler  functionality is too hard to test: the design is very bad.
I'm not going to add any unit tests here.
replies.author: denis-anisimov
